description: A 6-day luxury solo journey to Vietnam (Hanoi, Halong Bay, Hoi An, Ho Chi Minh City) with curated upscale experiences including private tours, cruise, top-tier resorts, fine dining, and cultural highlights. Designed for comfort, immersion, and indulgence.

activities: Arrive in Hanoi. Check into Sofitel Legend Metropole Hanoi. Explore Old Quarter. Attend traditional Water Puppet Show.
itinerary.transportation: International flights not included. Private airport pickups and city transfers. Domestic flights: Hanoi > Da Nang; Da Nang > Ho Chi Minh City. Private car from Hanoi to Halong Bay and return. Cruise transport on Halong Bay.
itinerary.notes: All accommodations selected for luxury experience and quality service. Estimate covers upscale dining, private tours, and classes. Arrange airport transfers in advance.

activities: Private car transfer to Halong Bay. Board luxury Bai Tu Long Bay cruise. Kayaking, gourmet dining, sunset views.
accommodation: Luxury cruise cabin (private charter Bai Tu Long Bay)
itinerary.notes: International flights to/from Vietnam excluded from budget. Check for visa requirements online. Weather can be humid in September, occasional rain expected in North/Central Vietnam.

activities: Morning tai chi and breakfast on cruise. Return to Hanoi, flight to Da Nang. Transfer to Four Seasons Resort The Nam Hai in Hoi An.
accommodation: Four Seasons Resort The Nam Hai, Hoi An
itinerary.notes: The suggested budget breakdown: Accommodations $1,000, Domestic Flights $300, Transfers $200, Cruise $400, Dining/Activities $500. You can adjust tour types and hotels for flexibility.

activities: Tour Hoi An Ancient Town. Custom tailor visit. Private Vietnamese culinary class. Relax at resort.
accommodation: Four Seasons Resort The Nam Hai, Hoi An

activities: Fly to Ho Chi Minh City. Check into Park Hyatt Saigon. City tour: Notre Dame Cathedral, Central Post Office, War Remnants Museum. Rooftop fine dining.
accommodation: Park Hyatt Saigon, Ho Chi Minh City

activities: Spa morning or final shopping. Private transfer to Tan Son Nhat International Airport for departure.
